alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 9:17AM EDT until May 22 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Thomas County in south central Georgia... * Until 945 AM EDT. * At 916 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thomasville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Boston, Everett, Newark, Eason, Metcalf and Oaklawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
